name: Weezing
flavorText:
Where two kinds
of poison gases
meet, 2 KOFFINGs can fuse into a
WEEZING over many
years.

previous.name: Koffing
previous.flavorText:
Because it stores
several kinds of
toxic gases in its body, it is
prone to exploding
without warning.

next.name: Rhyhorn
next.flavorText:
A POKéMON with a
one-track mind.
Once it charges,  it won't stop
running until it
falls asleep.
